attributes.action: recognise that animal rights campaigners have rights to free speech.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its understandable to get arrested for violence, say, towards workers at vivisection labs, but just saying things, like calling them murderers, that's just true. If they don't like it they should get another job. We have a right to free speech, but that right is being eroded by their right to kill animals. I'm not saying we should get away with violence, only a small minority of animal rights campaigners do that anyway, but telling the truth should not be a punishable offence.
